chapter.title: What's the REST API documentation?
chapter.para: System Resources - Resources used to handle system operations such as signing in and retreiving information about the current user and session.
Data Resources, version 1.0 - Resources used to retreive education data or to create, update, or delete that data.
Data Resources, version 1.1 - Resources used to retreive education data or to create, update, or delete that data.
Data Resources, version 1.1 - Resources used to retreive education data or to create, update, or delete that data.
